channel.title: Synchronization on Jaigarage
channel.description: Recent content in Synchronization on Jaigarage

item.title: Sync Folders with Rsync
item.description: Rsync (remote synchronize) is a fast and versatile command-line utility for synchronizing files and directories between two locations. It’s widely used for backups, mirroring, and data migration due to its efficiency in transferring only the changed parts of files.
